channel.title: OSX Loading Issues
channel.description:
What happened: Hiya, I normally play on Win10 but tried running it on my MacBook Pro (latest model) It loads the intro splash screen "Awaiting Kings Approval", fades away then just hangs on a blurred background for 4 minutes before force-quitting itself.
What was SUPPOSED to happen: Load? I wasn't even able to get to the "Steam 1-click authentication"
Steps to reproduce this issue:
1. Run ToL on OSX
Stats are: OSX High Sierra (10.13.1) MacBook Pro 13" Late 2017 2.3Ghz i5 8GB RAM Intel Iris Plus 640 1536MB
I'd post crash logs but there's none either. :\

item.title: OSX Loading Issues
item.dc:creator: Rainflower
item.description:
What happened: Hiya, I normally play on Win10 but tried running it on my MacBook Pro (latest model) It loads the intro splash screen “Awaiting Kings Approval”, fades away then just hangs on a blurred background for 4 minutes before force-quitting itself.

What was SUPPOSED to happen:
Load? I wasn’t even able to get to the “Steam 1-click authentication”

Steps to reproduce this issue:

  1. Run ToL on OSX

Stats are:
OSX High Sierra (10.13.1)
MacBook Pro 13" Late 2017
2.3Ghz i5
8GB RAM
Intel Iris Plus 640 1536MB

I’d post crash logs but there’s none either. :\
